message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a fantastic product that I believe would be highly valuable to you. Given its unique features and potential, I'm offering it at a starting price of $2,300,000.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $1,500,000 for this product. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $1,500,000 is significantly below its true value and my initial asking price.  To move this forward, I'm willing to come down to $2,000,000. I believe this price reflects the immense potential this product holds for your business.

Thank you for adjusting your price, Alice. While I understand the value of the product, my budget constraints still limit me. I am willing to pay $1,300,000 for this product. I hope this revised offer aligns better with your expectations.
